BusinessProfile.name: BusinessProfile
BusinessProfile.description: Represents the insurance-related attributes for the insured business.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to this business profile.

ConsecWorkersCompCoverage.description: The number of consecutive years for which the insured business had workers’ compensation coverage.

CreditTypesUsed.description: The credit types used by the insured business.

HasDishonoredPolicies.description: Indicates whether the business has canceled policies, has not renewed policies, or has been denied policies in the past.

HasSufferedBankruptcy.description: Indicates whether the business has reported any bankruptcies in the past.

HasUncorrectedSafetyViolations.description: Indicates whether the business has any uncorrected safety violations.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system. This field is unique within your organization.

WorkersCompClaims.description: The number of workers’ compensation claims raised.

WorkersCompMedicalClaims.description: The number of workers’ compensation medical claims raised.
